West Germany 3 vs. Australia 0 in the 1974 World Cup

Information about the 1st Round Group 1 game played in the 1974 Soccer World Cup between the National Teams of Australia and West Germany with details about goals, starters and reserves, substitutions, cards and more.

Game played in the 1974 World Cup, 1st Round Group 1

Date: Tuesday, June 18, 1974

Australia 0 - 3 West Germany
Goals:
  12' Wolfgang Overath
  34' Bernd Cullmann
  53' Gerd Mueller
